QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Brushing Your Childs Teeth
QAPair.Answer: Good oral health starts at a very young age. Taking care of your child's gums and teeth every day helps prevent tooth decay and gum disease. It also helps make it a regular habit for your child. Learn how to care for your children's teeth and gums starting when they are a newborn. When children get old enough, teach them how to brush their teeth on their own.
